CustomField.description: Filter the related/sibling/parent/child agreements by the status category/status values of the primary agreement i.e. agreement being sent for eSignature. This setting is used only when the "Select Attachments From Related/Sibling" setting is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Filter the related/sibling/parent/child agreements by the status category/status values of the primary agreement i.e. agreement being sent for eSignature. This setting is used only when the "Select Attachments From Related/Sibling" setting is checked.
CustomField.label: Filter RSPC By Primary Agreement Status
